name: 6th Annual Peptides Congress
content: Over 450 peptides, proteins and antibodies attendees representing global pharmaceutical organisations, leading biotech companies and internationally renowned academic institutions Over 25 presentations and case studies focused on the key advancements in peptide development, therapeutics and formulation, delivery and manufacturing. Two-day interactive conference addressing three main themes: Peptide Discovery, Chemistry and Analytical Technologies Peptide Therapeutics Peptide Formulation, Delivery and Manufacturing Co-located with the 12th Annual Proteins & Antibodies Congress and 6th Annual Biosimilars & Biobetters Congress.
